trans-unit.source: Specifies the style and behavior of a control.
trans-unit.target: Specifica lo stile e il comportamento di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: Controls use this enumeration in various properties and methods to specify functionality.
trans-unit.target: Controlli di utilizzare questa enumerazione in varie proprietà e metodi per specificare le funzionalità.

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate ControlStyles bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo è possibile attivare uno stile chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metodo e passando il bit ControlStyles appropriati (o bits) e il valore booleano per impostare i bit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following line of Visual Basic code would enable double-buffering.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, la seguente riga di codice Visual Basic consentirebbe il doppio buffer.

trans-unit.source: ``` myControl.SetStyle(UserPaint Or AllPaintingInWmPaint Or DoubleBuffer, True) ``` If the AllPaintingInWmPaint bit is set to `true`, the window message WM_ERASEBKGND is ignored, and both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> methods are called directly from the window message WM_PAINT.
trans-unit.target: ``` myControl.SetStyle(UserPaint Or AllPaintingInWmPaint Or DoubleBuffer, True) ```Se il bit AllPaintingInWmPaint è impostato su `true`, la finestra di messaggio WM_ERASEBKGND verrà ignorata ed entrambi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>metodi vengono chiamati direttamente dalla finestra di messaggio WM_PAINT.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>

trans-unit.source: This generally reduces flicker unless other controls send the window message WM_ERASEBKGND to the control.
trans-unit.target: In genere una riduzione dello sfarfallio a meno che altri controlli di inviano il messaggio della finestra WM_ERASEBKGND al controllo.

trans-unit.source: You might send the window message WM_ERASEBKGRND to achieve a pseudo-transparent effect similar to SupportsTransparentBackColor; for example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> with flat appearance does this.
trans-unit.target: È possibile inviare il messaggio della finestra WM_ERASEBKGRND per ottenere un effetto pseudo-trasparente simile a SupportsTransparentBackColor; ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>con piatta esegue questa operazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: To fully enable double-buffering, you can set the OptimizedDoubleBuffer and AllPaintingInWmPaint bits to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per abilitare completamente il doppio buffer, è possibile impostare i bit OptimizedDoubleBuffer e AllPaintingInWmPaint `true`.

trans-unit.source: However the preferred method for enabling double buffering, which yields the same result, is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A> property for the control to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia il metodo preferito per l'abilitazione del doppio buffer, che restituisce lo stesso risultato, consiste nell'impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>proprietà per il controllo `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleBuffered%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SupportsTransparentBackColor bit is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> is set to a color whose alpha component is less than 255, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> will simulate transparency by asking its parent control to paint the background.
trans-unit.target: Se il bit SupportsTransparentBackColor è impostato su `true`e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>è impostata su un colore il cui componente alfa è minore di 255, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A>consente di simulare la trasparenza richiedendo al relativo controllo padre per disegnare lo sfondo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaintBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is not true transparency.
trans-unit.target: Non si tratta di trasparenza vera e propria.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there is another control between the control and its parent, the current control will not show the control in the middle.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se è presente un altro controllo tra il controllo e il relativo elemento padre, il controllo corrente non visualizzerà il controllo al centro.

trans-unit.source: When the UserMouse bit is set to `true`, the following methods are still called: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Quando il bit UserMouse è impostato su `true`, sono ancora chiamare i seguenti metodi: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseWheel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseHover%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control is clicked, if the StandardClick bit is set to `true` the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called and it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il controllo è selezionato, se il bit StandardClick è impostato su `true` il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo viene chiamato e viene generato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control is double-clicked, and both the StandardClick and StandardDoubleClick bits are set to `true`, the click is passed on to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si fa doppio clic il controllo e StandardClick sia StandardDoubleClick bit vengono impostati su `true`, fare clic su viene passato al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called and it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo viene chiamato e viene generato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, the control can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A> directly regardless of the StandardClick and StandardDoubleClick bit values.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il controllo può chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A>direttamente indipendentemente dal fatto di StandardClick e StandardDoubleClick valori di bit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnDoubleClick%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on control click and double click behaviors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> topics.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul controllo fare clic su e fare doppio clic su comportamenti, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>argomenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the UseTextForAccessibility bit is set and there is a value in the control's `Text` property, the value of that control's `Text` property determines the control's default Active Accessibility name and shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene impostato il bit UseTextForAccessibility e non vi è un valore del controllo `Text` proprietà, il valore di tale controllo `Text` proprietà determina tasto Active Accessibility predefiniti nome e la scelta rapida del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the text of the preceding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> control will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il testo dell'oggetto precedente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>controllo verrà utilizzato invece.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: This style is set by default.
trans-unit.target: Questo stile è impostato per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Certain built-in control types, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, reset this style so that the `Text` property of those controls will not be used by Active Accessibility.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di controllo incorporato, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, reimpostare questo stile in modo che il `Text` proprietà di tali controlli non essere utilizzata da Active Accessibility.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control ignores the window message WM_ERASEBKGND to reduce flicker.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo Ignora la finestra di messaggio WM_ERASEBKGND per ridurre lo sfarfallio.

trans-unit.source: This style should only be applied if the UserPaint bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo stile deve essere applicato solo se il bit UserPaint è impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control keeps a copy of the text rather than getting it from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> each time it is needed.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo mantiene una copia di testo, anziché dal recupero di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>ogni volta che risulta necessaria.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: This style defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita questo stile <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This behavior improves performance, but makes it difficult to keep the text synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento consente di migliorare le prestazioni, ma è difficile mantenere la sincronizzazione del testo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is a container-like control.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo è un controllo contenitore simile.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, drawing is performed in a buffer, and after it completes, the result is output to the screen.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>disegno viene eseguito in un buffer e una volta completato, il risultato viene restituito alla schermata.

trans-unit.source: Double-buffering prevents flicker caused by the redrawing of the control.
trans-unit.target: Doppio buffer impedisce lo sfarfallio causato dal ridisegno del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If you set DoubleBuffer to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, you should also set UserPaint and AllPaintingInWmPaint to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta DoubleBuffer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, è necessario impostare anche UserPaint e AllPaintingInWmPaint per <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnNotifyMessage*> method is called for every message sent to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, <> </> *> metodo viene chiamato per ogni messaggio inviato al controllo <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: This style defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita questo stile <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: EnableNotifyMessage does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: EnableNotifyMessage non funziona in attendibilità parziale.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control has a fixed height when auto-scaled.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo ha un'altezza fissa quando verrà scalato.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a layout operation attempts to rescale the control to accommodate a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>, the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un'operazione di layout tenta di modificare la scala il controllo per gestire un nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>, il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>rimane invariato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control has a fixed width when auto-scaled.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo ha una larghezza fissa quando verrà scalato.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a layout operation attempts to rescale the control to accommodate a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>, the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un'operazione di layout tenta di modificare la scala il controllo per gestire un nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>, il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>rimane invariato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is drawn opaque and the background is not painted.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo viene disegnato opaco e non viene disegnato lo sfondo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is first drawn to a buffer rather than directly to the screen, which can reduce flicker.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo viene innanzitutto creato in un buffer anziché direttamente alla schermata, per ridurre lo sfarfallio.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, you should also set the AllPaintingInWmPaint to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se si imposta questa proprietà su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, è necessario impostare anche la AllPaintingInWmPaint <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control is redrawn when it is resized.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo viene ridisegnato quando viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo può ricevere lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control implements the standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo implementa lo standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control implements the standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick"></xref> behavior.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo implementa lo standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick"> </xref> comportamento.

trans-unit.source: This style is ignored if the StandardClick bit is not set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo stile viene ignorato se non è impostato il bit StandardClick <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*> with an alpha component of less than 255 to simulate transparency.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo accetta un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>con un componente alfa minore di 255 per simulare la trasparenza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Transparency will be simulated only if the UserPaint bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the parent control is derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La trasparenza verrà simulata solo se il bit UserPaint è impostato su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e il controllo padre è derivato da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control does its own mouse processing, and mouse events are not handled by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo esegue la propria elaborazione di mouse e gli eventi del mouse non vengono gestiti dal sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the control paints itself rather than the operating system doing so.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, il controllo disegna se stesso, anziché il sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> non viene generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: This style only applies to classes derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Questo stile si applica solo alle classi derivate da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the value of the control's `Text` property, if set, determines the control's default Active Accessibility name and shortcut key.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il valore del controllo `Text` proprietà, se impostato, determina il tasto il controllo predefinito Active Accessibility nome e la scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
